block.crossroads.atmos_charger: Intuitive design means putting the documentation in the item name has 4 iron bars as a pole on top of it sometimes
block.crossroads.permeable_quartz: Permeable Fancy looking block that does vanilla crafting but also can sometimes do special crafting depending on your chosen path (or paths depending on the config) but it can craft with a redstone signal also
block.crossroads.detailed_auto_crafter: Fancy looking block that does vanilla crafting but also can sometimes do special crafting depending on your chosen path (or paths depending on the config) but it can craft with a redstone signal also
item.crossroads.gear_base: %1$s Gear that are 1 blocks wide and also does not have an axles on it
item.crossroads.gear_base_large: %1$s Gears that are three blocks wide and also has an axle on it
item.crossroads.gear_toggle_inv: Redstone (which can be farmed) Invërtëd %1$s Togglë Gëar
item.crossroads.axle: %1$s Axle which is a rod that spins sometimes
item.crossroads.clutch: %1$s Clutch which is like a gear that can switch sometimes
item.crossroads.clutch_inv: Inverted %1$s Clutch same thing but inverted
item.crossroads.axle_mount: %1$s Axle Mount which is an axle that can be mounted
fluid.crossroads.dirty_water: Liquidy lava kinda Water but Dirty
tt.crossroads.salt_block: Kills plants and slimes around it lmao L
tt.crossroads.meter.fluid_tank.plural: %1$d internal tanks more like internal DANKS amirite
tt.crossroads.meter.fe: Chargeness of RF/FE which is POwer: %1$d/%2$dFE
tt.crossroads.fcc.desc: Cools liquidy kinda lava things to solid form, creating ouch burn in the process
tt.crossroads.fcc.rate: Releases ouch burn at up to %1$f°C/t
tt.crossroads.crucible.info: Stuff go to liquidy lava kinda stuff.. Uses %1$d°C per stuff
tt.crossroads.heat_battery.info: Acts as a buffer to slow down temperature change
tt.crossroads.heat_sink.desc: Has a large configurable ouch burn loss
tt.crossroads.icebox.desc: Adds: -%1$d°C/t while using cold items as fuel
tt.crossroads.salt_reactor.desc: Mixes Bar and distilled water into water for cooling, can reach absolute zero when it is awesome
tt.crossroads.salt_reactor.fuel: Consumes: 1 salt and %1$dmB distilled water every %2$d ticks
tt.crossroads.salt_reactor.quip: Nothing actually reacts, so what makes it a reactor? I'll give you a hint it's the pirate
tt.crossroads.blast_furnace.desc: Uses carbon to melt ore clumps and ore grit
tt.crossroads.cheat_heat.desc: Adds %1$d°C when used on a cable
tt.crossroads.cheat_rotary.desc: Adds %1$dJ when used on a gear
tt.crossroads.crank.back: Shift-right clicking adds %1$d J in the other direction
tt.crossroads.rain_idol.quip: Have you heard the word of our lord and saviour, this blue rock with rain powers?
tt.crossroads.damp_powder.desc: Extinguishes any nearby flame clouds on use
tt.crossroads.millstone.power: Consumes: Up to %1$s J/t while running
tt.crossroads.drill.desc.gold: Breaks blocks and attacks mobs, counting as a player kill
tt.crossroads.stamp_mill.desc: Grinds down ore. Has a chance to fail if average speed is below %1$d rad/s
tt.crossroads.stirling_engine.desc: Creates power from a temperature difference
tt.crossroads.stirling_engine.rate: Moves %1$d°C/t for every 100°C of temperature difference
tt.crossroads.stirling_engine.power: Produces %1$s J for every °C moved per 100°C of temperature difference
tt.crossroads.stirling_engine.limit: Stops producing power once it reaches %1$frad/s
tt.crossroads.wind_turbine.desc: Creates power from the wind; Power and direction change randomly
tt.crossroads.wind_turbine.env: Requires a view of the sky and a 5x5 empty space
tt.crossroads.wind_turbine.limits: Useless above %1$frad/s; Comparators read power output
tt.crossroads.dynamo.usage: Consumes: All available energy each tick (AKA %1$dω² J/t)
tt.crossroads.edible_blob.quip: Just like mama used to make
tt.crossroads.fat_congealer.desc: Creates custom food from Liquid Fat; Disabled by redstone
tt.crossroads.fat_congealer.hun: Food value is %1$d * top gear speed
tt.crossroads.fat_congealer.sat: Saturation value is %1$d * bottom gear speed
tt.crossroads.fat_congealer.quip: Welcome to McRaft's, can I take your order?
tt.crossroads.fat_feeder.desc: Feeds players in range with Liquid Fat. Can breed animals
tt.crossroads.fat_feeder.goal: Range increases as liquid fat content approaches 1/2
tt.crossroads.fluid_void.quip: Literally just a sponge with an input
tt.crossroads.ore_cleanser.desc: Washes Ore Grit for more efficient processing
tt.crossroads.ore_cleanser.water: Produces: %1$dmB Dirty Water per Ore Grit
tt.crossroads.pump.desc: Pumps the liquid source directly under it
tt.crossroads.pump.power: Consumes: Up to %1$s J/t while running
tt.crossroads.steam_boiler.tier: Boils %2$dmB/t of water using %3$d°C/t when above %1$d°C
tt.crossroads.water_centrifuge.desc: Converts water into distilled water and salt or dirty water into distilled water and byproducts
tt.crossroads.water_centrifuge.spin: Requires the spin direction to change every time the speed hits %1$frad/s
tt.crossroads.water_centrifuge.reds: Comparators measure a 1 when the needed direction is negative
tt.crossroads.water_centrifuge.quip: Produces League of Legends players extractor of inherent magical powers from everyday materials
tt.crossroads.light_cluster.decor: Safe for decoration, can be dyed
tt.crossroads.beam_redirector.desc: Toggles beam output between two directions based on a redstone signal
tt.crossroads.beam_extractor.desc: extractor of inherent magical powers from everyday materials
tt.crossroads.beam_extractor.quip: extractor of inherent magical powers from everyday materials?
tt.crossroads.beam_siphon.desc: Siphons off a beam power equal to redstone signal to the front. Remaining beams come out the back
tt.crossroads.beam_splitter.desc: Splits off a portion equal to the redstone signal over 15 to the front. Remaining beams come out the back
tt.crossroads.crystal_prism.desc: Splits beams into 4 beams of the basic alignments
tt.crossroads.crystal_master_axis.desc: Beams give attached gear networks special properties based on alignment
tt.crossroads.quartz_stabilizer.desc: Buffers beams and emits them with constant power
tt.crossroads.quartz_stabilizer.wrench: Output rate configured via shift-right-clicking with a wrench
tt.crossroads.quartz_stabilizer.setting: Output is now capped at %1$d power/cycle
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil.desc: Allows transferring FE when used with a Tesla Coil Top
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil.top: Different tops can increase range, transfer rate, or act as a weapon
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil.leyden: Insert a Leyden Jar to increase capacity by %1$dFE
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil.quip: Sure you could use wires, if you're lame
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil_top.att: Cannot transfer power. Attacks nearby entities with electric shocks
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil_top.decor: Cannot transfer power. Shoots decorative arcs
tt.crossroads.tesla_coil_top.leyden: Requires a Leyden Jar installed in the Tesla Coil
tt.crossroads.maxwell_demon.top: ouch burns top to %1$d°C while running at %2$d°C/t
tt.crossroads.maxwell_demon.bottom: Cools bottom to %1$d°C while running at -%2$d°C/t
tt.crossroads.atmos_charger.desc: Stores and retrieves FE from a shared "atmosphere"
tt.crossroads.atmos_charger.safety: Charging the atmosphere over 50% could have global consequences
tt.crossroads.atmos_charger.structure: Intuitive design means putting the documentation in the item name
tt.crossroads.atmos_charger.circuit: Circuits measure atmospheric charge level as a percentage (0-100)
tt.crossroads.charging_stand.desc: Allows reagents to react in a charged environment
tt.crossroads.chemical_vent.quip: Crossroads does not sanction war crimes, but will totally let you
tt.crossroads.heat_limiter.desc_purpose: Only allows ouch burn to flow until the front reaches the target temperature
tt.crossroads.heat_limiter.desc_mode: In red mode, stops when hotter than target; In blue mode, stops when colder than target
tt.crossroads.heat_limiter.desc_circuit: Target temperature set via Circuit signal
tt.crossroads.cage_charger.desc: Charges Beam Cages placed on it with incoming beams
tt.crossroads.cage_charger.redstone: Circuits measure total power of the held cage
tt.crossroads.detailed_crafter.desc: Allows unlocking and crafting Technomancy and Alchemy recipes
tt.crossroads.bobo_rod.desc: Creates bizarre and powerful Bobo Items
tt.crossroads.bobo_rod.use: Use on 3 dropped ingredients and an offering to craft
tt.crossroads.bobo_rod.quip: A gift of the Derpy One
tt.crossroads.reagent_filter.desc: Filters out selected reagents to the side output
tt.crossroads.reagent_filter.filter: Filter is set by inserting a bottle with the target reagents
tt.crossroads.tesla_ray.leyden: Powered by a Leyden Jar in the offhand
tt.crossroads.flux_node.link: Link to outputs with a Linking Tool
tt.crossroads.clock_stab.desc: A beam stabilizer that can store unlimited power and emits %1$d%% each cycle
tt.crossroads.clock_stab.circuit: Circuits read the total stored power
tt.crossroads.redstone_axis.desc: A Master Axis that holds speed steady at the incoming redstone signal
tt.crossroads.redstone_axis.power: Draws any needed power from a gear on the back
tt.crossroads.time_accel.config: Tile Entity acceleration disabled via config
tt.crossroads.time_accel.desc: Speeds up time in a %1$dx%1$dx%1$d area
tt.crossroads.time_accel.beam: Requires a time beam in the back- higher powers have a bigger boost
tt.crossroads.time_accel.wrench: Shift-right-click with a wrench to change the mode of what it affects
tt.crossroads.time_accel.flux: Produces Temporal Entropy while running, with more produced at higher boosts
tt.crossroads.ccc.desc: Makes Molten Copshowium from liquids when hit by a TIME beam
tt.crossroads.ccc.mult: 1mB of liquid will become %1$fmB of Molten Copshowium
tt.crossroads.ccc.flux: Produces %1$dTEn per Bar produced if using cheaper liquids
tt.crossroads.ccc.limit: Destroyed if overflowed with Molten Copshowium
tt.crossroads.ccc.io: Copshowium is piped out the bottom. Ingredient liquids can be input AND output the top
tt.crossroads.beacon_harness.desc: Produces massive color-changing beams when supplied with the alignment of the missing color
tt.crossroads.beacon_harness.buffer: Ignores the input beam for 2 seconds after changing needed color
tt.crossroads.beacon_harness.flux: Produces %1$dTEn/cycle while running, must be placed under a beacon
tt.crossroads.beacon_harness.quip: It's balanced because it requires nether stars
tt.crossroads.gateway.desc: Forms interdimensional portals when assembled (hollow square of frame, top center controller, use wrench)
tt.crossroads.gateway.dial: Dial the address of another portal to link to it
tt.crossroads.gateway.proc: Connect an axle to the controller, and rotate to dial. Pulse with a beam to lock in a chevron
tt.crossroads.gateway.flux: The source portal produces %1$dTEn while running
tt.crossroads.flux_sink.desc: Accepts and destroys unlimited Temporal Entropy
tt.crossroads.flux_sink.beacon: Must be placed over a beacon to function
tt.crossroads.flux_sink.quip: Dumps unstable waste into an unsuspecting parallel universe
tt.crossroads.chrono_harness.desc: Produces FE for free, but creates Temporal Entropy as a byproduct
tt.crossroads.recall_device.desc: Allows rewinding time for yourself. Save by shift-right-clicking, recall and save previous moments by right-clicking
tt.crossroads.recall_device.debuff: Applies debuffs based on how far back time is rewound
tt.crossroads.recall_device.config: Can rewind time by up to %1$d seconds
tt.crossroads.recall_device.config.disab: This item has been disabled in the config
tt.crossroads.recall_device.config.unlim: Has no limit on how far it can rewind time
tt.crossroads.recall_device.wrong_player: You are not the player who stored this moment
tt.crossroads.recall_device.expired: This saved moment is too old
tt.crossroads.recall_device.not_wound: Insufficient Spring Speed. Wind in a Spring Winding Stand
tt.crossroads.steamer.desc: Cooks food quickly using steam (%1$d ticks/item)
tt.crossroads.spring_gun.winding: Damage: %1$s/%2$s; Wound in a Spring Winding Table.
tt.crossroads.spring_gun.desc: Shoots arrows for high damage, must be re-wound each shot. Does more damage when wound more
tt.crossroads.spring_gun.quip: A gun if gunpowder was made of springs
tt.crossroads.winding_table.desc: Winds up certain items using rotary power; I: %1$s
tt.crossroads.winding_table.reds: Increases the spring speed by %1$s with each redstone pulse
tt.crossroads.winding_table.counter: Applies a resistive power loss of -%1$s J/t per rad/s of the item being wound
tt.crossroads.winding_table.destroy: Destroys the item if the block's speed drops below the spring speed
tt.crossroads.winding_table.loss: Loses all progress if the block's speed drops below the spring speed
tt.crossroads.winding_table.circuit: Circuits read the spring speed of the item being wound, in rad/s
tt.crossroads.whirligig.desc: Provides slowfall and even flight if wound in a Spring Winding Table
tt.crossroads.whirligig.elevate: Elevates the player when Spring Speed is above %1$frad/s
tt.crossroads.pig_zombie_chestplate.quip: We've got to be in Cognito
tt.crossroads.path_sigil.desc: Unlocks a path when used. Single use
tt.crossroads.path_sigil.desc.forget: Shift-right click to forget this path
tt.crossroads.path_sigil.forget.fail.con: Cannot forget paths; Disabled in the config
tt.crossroads.path_sigil.fail: Can not unlock path; Too many paths known
tt.crossroads.path_sigil.taken: Can not unlock path; Path already known
tt.crossroads.detailed_auto_crafter.basi: Automatically crafts path-specific recipes when given a redstone pulse
tt.crossroads.detailed_auto_crafter.sigi: Requires an installed sigil of the recipe's path
tt.crossroads.lodestone_turbine.desc: Produces: %1$fJ/t while in a dimension where compasses & clocks don't work
tt.crossroads.lodestone_turbine.quip: Frickin Magnets, How Do They Work?
tt.crossroads.axle_mount.desc: A decorative wall mount for axles
tt.crossroads.sequence_box.desc: Stores a sequence of redstone circuit values and outputs them in order
tt.crossroads.sequence_box.trigger: Advances 1 step in the sequence with each strong redstone pulse
container.beam_extractor: The redstone farm machine that can use items to shoot magicy lasers at other stuff to convert it
subtitle.crossroads.beam_transmute: Magicy laser thingy does a zapp zapp
subtitle.crossroads.arc: t h i c c zap
reagent.hellfire: right click on your friends house
crossroads.advancement.path.witchcraft.d: NYI; Pack makers can use this
crossroads.advancement.align.energy.desc: Discover the primary beam alignment: Energy
crossroads.advancement.align.light.desc: Discover the zip zap machine alignment: Light
crossroads.advancement.align.potential.d: Discover the primary beam alignment: Potential
crossroads.advancement.align.stability.d: Discover the primary beam alignment: Stability
crossroads.advancement.align.void.desc: Discover the primary beam alignment: Void
